playn.core
Class GroupLayerImpl<L extends AbstractLayer>

java.lang.Object
  playn.core.GroupLayerImpl<L>

public class GroupLayerImpl<L extends AbstractLayer>
extends Object

Provides implementations for per-platform concrete GroupLayers. Because of single inheritance (and lack of traits) we have to delegate this implementation rather than provide an abstract base class.
